text: Laksata theva ki ya jagace jivana tara kevala khela tamasa ani sobha sajavata ani apasata abhimana (ani ahankara) ani dhana va santatita ekamekahuna svatahla jasta dakhavine ahe. Jyapramane pa'usa ani tyapasuna jhaleli paidavara setakaryanna sukhada vatate, maga jevha ti sukate tevha tila tumhi pivalya rangata pahatata, maga ti agadi curecura ho'una jate, ani akhiratamadhye sakta siksa-yatana ani allahaci maphi ani prasannata ahe ani ya jagace jivana kevala dhokyacya samugrisivaya anakhi kahica nahi
